programme.title: The South Florida University bomb
programme.short_synopsis: America's anti-terror legislation and the South Florida University bomb.
programme.medium_synopsis: The University of South Florida's reaction to a bomb threat leads Alistair Cooke to consider the emergence and nature of America's new anti-terrorism laws.
